name: Life of Dying
description:
Story

Since falling asleep 13 hours after the virus had spread, John Sawjig woke up a t his home and found that all of the villagers had disappeared.  John must survive and go to the area where the rescued survivors before he find the zombie!!. And found that all the survivors had been moved to a new area.

How to Play

Press the W,A,S,D key to Walk.
Press the Spacebar to Jump.
Press the LShift to Run.
Press the Left Click to Attack.
Press the 1,2,3 key to SwithWeapons.
Press the M key to OpenMap.
Press the Right Click to Aim.
Press the R to Reload Ammo.

Play Instructions

Please aim at the head and do not eat unnecessarily.
